entry.title: Kingdoms
entry.content:
Long ago, before the cold
We built our roads and weren’t alone
We sung with pride, into the night
By candle-light, we were alive
Until the world, started to cry
Flowers they shone, into the sky
And life it seemed, so serene
The end of days, was not foreseen
To rise and fall, into the snow
We were so young, but felt so old
We saw the signs, but were so blind
And thought our lives, would never die
To climb so high in space, but fall so far from grace
We’re the chosen ones!
And build from sand, with narrow minds
We thought this day would never come
Broken homes and crumbling walls
Watch them collapse and hit the floor
Years of neglect and endless wars
Took its toll, this broken world
If all the choices made were thrown into the lake
It would turn pitch black!
And though some were wise
Mix them with heinous crimes
Another kingdom destroyed in vain
I’ve had enough, I’ll close my eyes
Take my mind, far from sight
My body’s gone, filled with disease
Let me decay with the earth and the trees
entry.summary:
Long ago, before the cold
We built our roads and weren’t alone
We sung with pride, into the night
By candle-light, we were alive

entry.title: The River Flows Frozen
entry.content:
作曲 : Antti Kokko & Jarmo Puolakanaho
作词 : Altti Veteläinen & Antti Kokko & Jarmo Puolakanaho
Like frozen leaves
像那霜冻的树叶
We are falling
我们一点一点坠落到
On to the soil so barren and cold
冰冷、荒芜的土地上

The rays of sun
那太阳的光辉
No more warming
不再温暖
Our hearts now so cold
我们的心如此冰冷

Through this field
穿过这片荒野
Of the withered flowers
只有凋零的花瓣
We go still one more time
我们又一次这样走过

The hidden beauty
那隐匿的美丽
Forever gone
永远地消逝
The river’s frozen once again
这河流再一次冻结
So came this time
又到了这个时刻
When moonlight blackened my heart:
月光占据了我的心灵

I can’t stand this pain
这痛苦让我无法忍受

The chain is broken
枷锁破碎
It’s tearing open my scars:
撕裂着我的伤口

I want to feel the flame…again
我想再一次……感受那如火的热情

The shine behind
那霜冻的河流之下
The frozen stream
闪耀着的光芒

Reminds me of your eyes
让我想起了你的眼睛

The spark of hope
那希望的火花
Still in my heart
仍在我心中迸发

Shall dreams become true under the ice
冰层之下的梦想能否实现？
entry.summary:
作曲 : Antti Kokko & Jarmo Puolakanaho
作词 : Altti Veteläinen & Antti Kokko & Jarmo Puolakanaho
Like frozen leaves
像那霜冻

entry.title: KILL4ME
entry.content:
作曲 : Marilyn Manson/Tyler Bates
作词 : Marilyn Manson/Tyler Bates
Let’s grab a gold switch blade
金色的闸刀在手中握紧
And make us a blood pact babe
让我们以鲜血签订契约 以此为证
To love and to and to only see ourselves
去寻找爱和性 仅仅忠于自己
And remember this:
也确保要牢记
Your hotel hall won’t be so vacant and
你旅途中不再有空缺的栖息地
I can tell that you ain’t faking it
我也可以相信你不再伪装
Because I take death threats
因为我将这死亡威胁
Like the best of them
看作压倒一切的证据
Would you kill kill kill 4 me?
你是否愿意为我杀戮 残虐 自尽
I love you enough to ask you again
我会再问一次 因为我足够爱你
Would you kill kill kill 4 me?
你是否愿意为我杀戮 残虐 自尽
You won’t be kissing me unless you kill 4 me
于我而言 没有杀戮等于没有亲吻
Bloody noses are just like roses
渗血的鼻翼如同血色的玫瑰
But what happens when we are betrayed
但如果我们遭到背叛 他又该当何罪
Won’t you drag him to the shed
你难道不会将那些畜生逼至角落
And unload six rounds in their ing face
冲他们脸上殴打好几回合
This is a sacrifice
大可将其视为牺牲
Your hotel hall won’t be so vacant and
你旅途中不再有空缺的栖息地
I can tell that you ain’t faking it
我也可以相信你不再伪装
Because I take death threats
因为我将这死亡威胁
Like the best of them
看作压倒一切的证据
Would you kill kill kill 4 me?
你是否愿意为我杀戮 残虐 自尽
I love you enough to ask you again
我会再问一次 因为我足够爱你
Would you kill kill kill 4 me?
你是否愿意为我杀戮 残虐 自尽
You won’t be kissing me unless you kill 4 me
于我而言 没有杀戮等于没有亲吻
Sideways for attention, long for results
割腕只是为博取关注 纵向深切才能死去
Who are you going to cross?
试图激怒有何意义
Sideways for attention, long for results
割腕为了博取关注 纵切才能让一切结束
Who are you going to cross?
激怒别人究竟有何所图
Sideways for attention, longways for results
割腕为了博取关注 纵切才能让一切结束
Who are you going to cross?
是谁让你尝试激怒
Would you kill kill kill 4 me?
你是否愿意为我杀戮 残虐 自尽
I love you enough to ask you again
我会再问一次 因为我足够爱你
Would you kill kill kill 4 me?
你是否愿意为我杀戮 残虐 自尽
I love you enough to ask you again
我会再问一次 因为我足够爱你
Would you kill kill kill 4 me?
你是否愿意为我杀戮 残虐 自尽
Sideways for attention, longways for results
割腕为了博取关注 纵切才能让一切结束
Who are you going to cross?
是谁让你尝试激怒
Kil kill kil 4 me
You won’t be kissing me unless you kill 4 me
于我而言 没有杀戮等于没有亲吻
Kil kill kil 4 me
杀戮 残虐 自尽

entry.title: So Fell Autumn Rain
entry.content:
作词 : Brennare

Leaving with twilight though I was chosen
已成无可篡改定局
To wander the way in the darkest of nights
多少次黑夜中徘徊
Oh in the summer sun how soon I came to stray
炎热下颠沛流离
A true damnation when I turned away
地狱就在我身后

So fell autumn rain washed away ali my pain
秋雨清洗我的痛楚 带走堕落
I feel brighter somehow lighter somehow to breath once again
让我再次重获平希望
So fell autumn rain washed my sorrows away
秋雨涤净我的悲凉 带走荒芜
With the sunset behind somehow I find the dreams are to stay
迷失在现实与梦的黄昏尽头

So fell autumn rain
坠落的秋雨

Blinded by dawning so you would take me
黎明时你是否会解开真相
Further away away from the fall
让我远离绝望的悲呛
Oh you told me I must never dream again
告诉让我不再沦陷的答案
A true damnation you left me the pain
化解挣脱不开的诅咒

So fell autumn rain but all things must pass
几经风雨磨砺 让我不再跌倒

all things must pass
一切都会过去
So fell autumn rain washed away all my pain
秋雨清洗我的痛楚 带走堕落
I feel brighter somehow lighter somehow to breath once again
让我再次重获平静希望
So tell autumn rain washed my sorrows away
秋雨涤净我的悲凉 带走荒芜
With the sunset behind somehow I find the dreams are to stay
迷失在现实与梦的黄昏尽头

So fell winter
徒留洁净无暇
entry.summary: 作词 : Brennare

entry.title: Beat It
entry.content:
They Told Him Don’t You Ever Come Around Here
他们叫他不准再踏入这个地方
Don’t Wanna See Your Face You Better Disappear
不想再看到你的脸，你最好消失
The Fire’s In Their Eyes And Their Words Are Really Clear
怒火在他们眼中燃烧，他们撂下的话很清楚
So Beat It Just Beat It
所以，走开！
You Better Run You Better Do What You Can
你最好逃走，尽你所能的闪远一点
Don’t Wanna See No Blood Don’t Be A Macho Man
别让有人流血，别逞匹夫之勇
You Wanna Be Tough Better Do What You Can
你最好逃走，尽你所能的闪远一点
So Beat It But You Wanna Be Bad
所以，走开！但你却想耍狠
Just Beat It Beat It Beat It Beat It
走开，就是走开！
No One Wants To Be Defeated
没有人想被打败
Showin’ How Funky Strong Is Your Fighter
虽然你干起架来又狠又强
It Doesn’t Matter Who’s Wrong Or Right
谁对谁错并不重要
Just Beat It Beat It
所以，走开！
Just Beat It Beat It
所以，走开！
Just Beat It Beat It
所以，走开！
They’re Out To Get You Better Leave While You Can
他们到处堵你，你能闪就闪
Just Beat It Beat It
所以，走开！
Don’t Wanna Be A Boy You Wanna Be A Man
别当小男孩，当个男子汉
You Wanna Stay Alive Better Do What You Can
你想当硬汉，最好尽你所能
So Beat It Just Beat It
所以，走开！
You Have To Show Them That You’re Really Not Scared
你必须让他们明白你并不害怕
You’re Playin’ With Your Life This Ain’t No Truth Or Dare
你是在玩命，这无关真理或胆量
They’ll Kick You Then They Beat You
他们先是又踢又打
Then They’ll Tell You It’s Fair
然后他们会说：扯平了！
So Beat It But You Wanna Be Bad
所以，走开！但你却想耍狠

走开，就是走开！

没有人想被打败

entry.title: 牡丹亭.寻梦---懒画眉
entry.content:
牡丹亭之寻梦
【懒画眉】

最撩人春色是今天，
少甚么低就高来粉画垣，
原来春心无处不飞悬。
是睡荼蘼抓住裙钗线，
恰便是花似人心向好处牵。
entry.summary:

【懒画眉】

最撩人春色是今天，

是睡荼蘼抓住裙钗线，
恰便是花似人心向好处牵。

entry.title: 无人喝彩
entry.content:
洞察生命

如痛楚、如旷野
如时代中的回音

虽然回音中并无旋律

亲吻刀刃

如自由 如音乐
如宿命中的蜕变

虽然蜕变中无人喝彩
